title: Rendering Adapters
description: Format-agnostic authoring layers that compile to Web Everything primitives. All three formats are interconvertible via AST transformers.

items.name: HTML Adapter
items.summary: The canonical format. Standard HTML with Web Everything enhancements (custom elements, behaviors, directives).

items.name: JSX Adapter
items.summary: Converts JSX/TSX syntax into standard templates, slots, and directive structures with full type safety.

items.name: Template String Adapter
items.summary: Tagged template literals (html\`...\`) that compile to the same primitives as HTML and JSX.

title: Syntax Adapters
description: Developer-facing layers that provide convenient syntax (sugar) compiling to standard protocols.

items.name: Functional Component Adapter
items.summary: Allows writing functional-style components that map to class-based Web Components.

title: Library Adapters
description: Implementation layers that bridge third-party ecosystem libraries to Web Blocks protocols.

items.name: Floating UI Adapter
items.summary: Implements the Positioning Protocol using the Floating UI library.

items.name: Mousetrap Adapter
items.summary: Connects the Mousetrap library to the Keyboard Shortcuts Module.
